explanation:
{{comic | number = 3 | date = September 30, 2005 | title = Island (sketch) | ognumber = 3 | ogtitle = Island | oglink = https://web.archive.org/web/20070927001941/http://xkcd-drawings.livejournal.com/?skip=40#:~:text=8%3A35%20pm-,Island,-I%20draw%20these | ogprev = 4 | ognext = 2 | image = island_color.jpg | titletext = Hello, island

''[https://web.archive.org/web/20070927001941/http://xkcd-drawings.livejournal.com/?skip=40#:~:text=8%3A35%20pm-,Island,-I%20draw%20these Original caption]:'' I draw these a lot. }} This was the third comic [[LiveJournal|originally posted to LiveJournal]]. The previous one was [[4: Landscape (sketch)]], and the next one was [[2: Petit Trees (sketch)]]. It was among the [[:Category:First day on LiveJournal|first thirteen comics]] posted to LiveJournal within 12 minutes on September 30, 2005, on the first day of the xkcd LiveJournal account. ==Explanation== Like many of [[Randall]]'s earlier comics, this does not appear to present a particular point, it's just a picture. The title text may be a reference to the classical {{w|"Hello, World!" program|"Hello, world!"}} program, traditionally the first program a developer runs when learning a new programming language. ==Transcript== :[A green island surrounded by blue water. A mountain is the only feature recognizable on it.] ==Trivia== This is the only comic that has the same number both on [https://xkcd.com xkcd.com] and on LiveJournal. {{comic discussion}} [[Category:Posted on LiveJournal| 03]] [[Category:First day on LiveJournal| 03]] [[Category:First day on xkcd.com]] [[Category:Comics with color]] [[Category:Checkered paper]] [[Category:Sketches]]
